GT.content: circular ring of “giving back (rendre),” circulation of debt not just that of things but values or symbols that are involved there (qui s’y engagent en-gage) [TN footnote on engager & its evocation of pledge]

R.content: annulment of time announced in date, revolution, volt of the ring (anneau), il faut le temps, default, failure, collapse [autos needing other, event, time, heteronomy]

HERP.content: caught in ring of circle once questioning philosophy, engaged by Greek tongue > acc. Heidegger, obscurely, authoritatively, Greek tongue alone is logos

MPM.content: de Man’s affirmation of memory, an alliance or ring more ancient, secret, resistant than familial or strategic alliances it makes possible, but is never reduced to

PAS.content: eternal ring, passivity of nonpower, strength in reception, restarts alliance w/out debt, gift w/out credit

S.content: the becoming-crepuscular (Dämmerung) is not a decline (Untergang), it shields the year, the course of the sun [Jahr, march (ier, ienai, gehen), translates race or course of sun]

SH.content: circumcision only once, at the same time “first & last,” ring, seal of alliance, anniversary of archeology/eschatology > ring traces, carves the “unwiederholbar (unrepeatable)”
“one time” in English, but “one turn,” “una vez,” “una volta,” in vicissitudes of latinity
anniversary ring—seal > date: spectral return of that which will never return
ring, sign of belonging itself, condition of return > cipher of seal, imprint of ring, counts more than content of message, what matters is mark of belonging, manifested alliance
date is a future anterior, the slightest indetermination increases the chances (of a future anterior), gives time one assigns to anniversaries to come
pledge, complementary object divide in 2 to seal alliance > moment of engagement, signature, contract, ring

the poem, folded and refolded in simplicity of the singular, a certain repetition makes readability possible > it signifies: there is shibboleth > there is something not shown: crypt, cipher > it speaks, the address takes place, permitting alliances, anniversaries, returns, even if there is no subsistent trace, scarcely ash
ring’s condition & fate of all archival recording > date marks itself, becomes readable, by freeing itself from singularity it recalls, its body becomes ideal, coded

ideality carries forgetting in its memory, the memory of forgetting itself, the truth of forgetting > reference to singular event annulled in ring’s annulation, the date’s turning-about, una volta, volte-face, revolt, revolution
poem, in offering itself, risks losing its time and place to the holocaustic generality of recurrence and readability of concept, the anniversary repetition of unrepeatable
effacement of date or name inside the ring: origin of philosophy, hermeneutics, poetics, their sendoff [envois]
circumcision of word is not dated in history, has no age, but calls forth date, opens word to other, of all that calls itself (the name, blessing of name, yes & no) > it sets turning the ring
how to guard against double edge of shibboleth? w/ “living Nothing in the heart,” perhaps [St. Paul’s too literal, Derrida’s exorcism, from circle to ring]

P.content: Hegel’s ternary rhythm—what he calls a “ring”—encircles, links to other rings: in science of beautiful, mind presupposes, anticipates itself > philosophy of art: circle in circle of circles

OTO.content: anniversary, birthday, an annulus, moment when year annuls itself and begins anew, forms a ring w/ itself

autobiographical récit, tells himself his life, affirms EROS, gratitude for gift (gift: establishment of my own credit w/ this name): EROS signs or seals > before such signature, my life may be mere prejudice (reaffirmation of the hymen, alliance or wedding ring, eternal return, “yes, yes” to shadowless gift of high noon)
it is life, as the living feminine, that must return eternally, selectively > life allied to herself by nuptial annulus, wedding ring
btwn title & book to come, exergue situates place from which life will be recited: yes, yes, amen, amen, I sign, I am in debt to “high noon” [instant of signature, no place]

REST.content: Van Gogh left a trap, lacet (snare) [at bottom right corner of picture, cf. p. 258] > cette boucle étrange, une sorte de noeud esquissé, untied shoes, forms an open circle, pincers or key ring, a leash (laisse), as though taking the place of his signature [cf. DST 323n ring linked to deconstruction]

Heidegger’s Verlässlichkeit (reliability, solidity), [what Heidegger restitutes from Van Gogh’s painting?], anterior to opposition useful/sacred, comes from earth/world, from trait, the Ring required for a hymen per fidem, makes commitment possible, fidelity that predates everything
Heidegger’s Geborgenheit associates hidden, crypted secret w/ being-in-safety: what one must hold in reserve, conceal, to live > tightening of originary ring > effect of Verlässlichkeit

DST.content: [in reference to method found in Lacoue-Labarthe] supplementary loop (boucle), tempted to call it a ring (anneau), voire bague (band), a certain circulation takes on value of prescription: obligation, injunction, alliance > detour & return path > inside and outside path of epochality
haunted by mimesis: loop or supplementary torsion, the ring both one more and one less in epochal chain, dissimulates itself [disorganizes/interrupts Heideggerian deconstruction?]

deconstruction (as/via [?] supplementary ring [anneau]) sometimes a task (tâche), sometimes an event (in a “practical” situation) > Lacoue-Labarthe says deconstruction’s a word “not in the least ‘worn out (usé)’” [cf. REST p. 277 ring linked to Van Gogh’s trap?]

ATM.content: Levinas has not only withdrawn dissymmetrical responsibility from circle (of pact, debt, synchronic reciprocity, recognition) but also from annular alliance, from the rounds (tour), whatever makes the rounds of a finger, of a sex or sexual organ [?]

D.content: Heidegger: “radiantly, the ring joins the 4, everywhere open to the riddle of their presence”

LG.content: une autre bouche ou une autre boucle invaginante—double chiasmatic invagination of edges

CIR.content: blood mixed w/ saliva, w/ sperm, fellatio, make all the readers drool; p. 158 autofellocircumcision; p. 218 ejaculating into bloody mouth of circumcising mother > exultant alliance, her legs open, breasts btwn my legs, both laughing, passing skin from mouth to mouth like a ring
in search of Saint Foreskin, gram of “lost part of self,” has the form of a Ring [objet a?]
all my tears (of love), prayers, bleeding like overflow of murders I carry w/in myself, knowing not whether I committed them or not, against the other or against me
spare the sister, she, the password, our lifelong secret, inside of the ring

SPEC.content: Indra–Varuna (Abraham–Isaac-like) interlace their names w/out revenir sur eux-mêmes (not a ring) > cannot close, so enclose each other > always a [double signature]

PP btwn 2 limits of the w/out pleasure: stricture & discharge, preparation & end, desire & final fulfillment: liminary place of passage (hymen indécis pris dans l’anneau), le passage du pas: pleasure arrives only to erase itself
